column1: Kata Robata////This is just a quick review. Let's face it
column2: Kata Robata is known for great food so I'll just say yes
column5: delicate and beautifully presented. All as expected and the reputation is well deserved. The thing that impressed me
column7: was our server. She was WONDERFUL. Knowledgeable
column10: never seemed stressed or hurried even with a full load of tables. Food arrived faster than I'd ever seen or expected. Seriously one of the best service experiences I've ever had. Kudos to Kata for having her (and she said she'd been there about 10 years
column11: so that says a lot about the business). Â I'll remember the food but I'll remember our wonderful server even more.
